biotools.summary: EFMrep provides an extended model of EuroForMix by allowing different model parameters to be assigned to each DNA profile involved in the analysis, rather than applying global model parameters to all.

bioschemas.name: EFMrep
bioschemas.summary: EFMrep provides an extended model of EuroForMix by allowing different model parameters to be assigned to each DNA profile involved in the analysis, rather than applying global model parameters to all.
